meanings.sent1: She slipped on the ice and landed right on her patoot.
meanings.sent2: The baby's patoot looked adorable in the tiny diaper.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't sit comfortably after falling on his patoot.
meanings.sent4: The cat's tail puffed up like a patoot when it got scared.
meanings.sent5: The patoot of the statue was shiny from all the people sitting on it for photos.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affectionate nickname.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always calls me her little patoot.
meanings.sent2: I love it when you call me that sweet patoot.
meanings.sent3: The dog's wagging tail made him look like a happy patoot.
meanings.sent4: She's the queen of the kitchen, her apron proudly displaying 'Chef Patoot'.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's laughter filled the room as she hugged her favorite stuffed patoot.
